ch.dieseite.colladaloader.wrappers

Class ColladaModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.dieseite.colladaloader.wrappers.ColladaModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataAssembler.LoadingListener, java.io.Serializable

    public class ColladaModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataAssembler.LoadingListener, java.io.Serializable

    This class holds all 3D data and supports transform functions

    This source is free; you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License and by nameing of the originally author

    Version:
    3.1
    Author:
    Markus Zimmermann http://www.die-seite.ch
    See Also:

      • draw

        public void draw()

        Draws the model using Processing P3D renderer.

        The source code of this method can be used as drawing example if user want to customize

        .

        This is a untested part because software developers platform crashed on actual P3D/P2D version so he was forced to use the GLAdapter instead

      • draw2D

        public void draw2D()
        Draws collada using Processing default 2D renderer

      • scale

        public void scale(float factor)
        makes the model (not the view) smaller or bigger
        Parameters:
        factor - value < 1.0f = smaller, value > 1.0f = bigger

      • shift

        public void shift(float len,
                  char axis)
        shifts the model (not the view) along the axis x,y or z
        Parameters:
        len - (in pixels)
        axis - valid characters for the axis is: 'x','y' or 'z'

      • rotate

        public void rotate(float radiant,
                   char axis)
        Rotates the model (not the view) in X,Y,or Z Axis
        Parameters:
        radiant - from 0 to 2*PI
        axis - valid characters for the axis is: 'x','y' or 'z'
